item.title: New papers
item.description: Recent publications Prebiotic Xylo-oligosaccharides Targeting Faecalibacterium prausnitzii Prevent High Fat Diet-induced Hepatic Steatosis in Rats with Lensu et al. Eicosanoid Inflammatory Mediators Are Robustly Associated With Blood Pressure in the General Population by Palmu et al. Unsupervised hierarchical clustering identifies a metabolically challenged subgroup of hypertensive individuals by Vaura et al.
